title: Another instance of the League client is running.  Please close it and try again.
body:
Yesterday I was playing league fine now today when I try and open it is says "Another instance of the League client is running.  Please close it and try again." I cannot find where the client is running and need help. 
This never happened before the new client was released so it must be a bug with the new client. Please fix it.

replies.body:
Found a solution: I have a Mac, so I'm sure how to get get to the location where your League files are found but if you can you can follow these steps and get League working again. ( Ignore the parts that deal with how to get there for Pc's because once again I am using a Mac, Sorry :(( ) 

Solution: 1) Delete the older client launcher icon off your dock ( or taskbar) and or   
                     desktop
                2) Open Finder and go to your applications ; find the old League client in  
                     applications , left click it , then click on the option
                     "Show Package Contents";
                3) Double click to get into "Contents" then into "Lol", there you will see the older  
                     Lol client launcher icon and "lockfile" ... . DELETE both things 
                4) Start up the New League Client and you should be good, you might have to 
                     click a few times and wait a while for it work, but there you have it. Enjoy   
                     League !!

 Add me to your friends list if your good @  CyborgSam :))
holy cow i have no clue how it works because i followed like half of your instructions but it worrrrrrrrrks!

Hello guys!

This bug just happened to me, so I decided to look it up. I could only really find mac users complaining about this, although this happened on my windows computer. For windows computers it is actually really simple. Just open your task manager, and delete the league of legends processors that are running.
another instance of the League client is running
I just submitted a bug report for that too, I'm glad im not the only one having this problem. Just started from new client update also.

GUYS I FINALLY FIGURED IT OUT
okay so when you click league it says something about already running right?
do you guys have 2 files about league in your taskbar?
there's one fancy and cool league one and there's regular league bar, delete the regular league bar and pin the fancy league bar on your taskbar
and then go to task manager and then end every task that's related to league then click the fancy one (if it doesn't work keep clicking it)
and it will load and then you're good to go. Have fun guys btw I'm only 15 don't know anything about fixing thing lol {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

This may be happening for a few reasons.  The first is that another crash may have occured and lingering in the background.  I recommend restarting your PC just in case this might be the reason. 

The other may be a security setting that's preventing the patcher or client from launching properly.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case a restart didn't' help.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I was having the same problem and this helped, thank you
since 2 weeks i cant play cause when i lauch my client it wont open
im just forget this game and do another things of my past time
